Font style.guideline: Use Lexend as the primary brand typeface.
Use Inter as the secondary brand typeface.

Logo safe zone.guideline: Maintain a minimum clear space around the logo equal to X (30px).
Do not place any graphic or typographic elements within the logo safe zone.

Logo colours.guideline: Do not shuffle around the Icon colors.
Do not use different colors for the logo.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use French Sky Blue (#85A0FE) to symbolize trust, clarity, and calm.
Use Lavender (#AA82FF) to represent creativity, innovation, and balance.
Use Tulip (#FE839C) to reflect passion, enthusiasm, and a forward-thinking attitude.
Use Bright Sun (#FFD14C) to convey positivity, optimism, and the spark of new ideas.
Use Dark Indigo (#380F57) to signify stability, professionalism, and depth.
Use the primary brand colors to represent the essence of the brand.
Apply a palette of fun and light colors to reflect the brandâ€™s dynamic and invite playfulness and creativity.
